      • exchangeCard

        boolean exchangeCard(ICard c1,
                   ICard c2,
                   ICard c3)
        Method for trading in cards for troops. Checks if you have three cards of the same type, or three cards of different types. Also makes sure you can only trade in one Joker at a time.

      • discard

        void discard()
        Discards the players cards when s/he loses. The cards are returned to the Deck
